TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeploymentProgressState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the current stage of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] download operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks DeploymentProgressState is passed by way of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> member of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, which is used by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> events. Use the members of this enumeration to determine what portion of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment has already been downloaded to the local machine.
## Examples The following code example installs the latest [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update asynchronously.
[!code-cs[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ClickOnceAPI/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.deployment.appl_0_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ClickOnceAPIVB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationFiles = int32(2)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] is downloading the DLLs and data files that comprised the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationInformation = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingDeploymentInformation = int32(0)
